p: All the experiments were performed at least in triplicates. Values represented as mean ± SE of at least three replicates. Origin 8.5 software (OriginLab, Northampton, MA, USA) was used to generate graphics with their mean data values and standard errors. The significance at p < 0.05 means and standard deviation were calculated by using Statistix 8.1 (Statistix, Tallahassee, FL, USA). All statistical analysis was performed with XL-STAT2019 (Addinsoft, Paris, France).
